install.name: YOOsnapshots
install.author: YOOtheme
install.description: YOOsnapshots module of the YOOtheme club (http://www.yootheme.com) for Joomla! 1.5. Adds Snap Shots (http://www.snap.com) to your site.

param.name: ap
param.label: Enable Snap Shots
param.description: Indicates whether Snap Shots are on or off by default. If YES Snap Shots is enabled on all links automatically. Use class snap_noshots to force a specific link to be disabled. If NO Snap Shots is disabled on all links. Use class snap_shots to force a specific link to be enabled

param.name: si
param.label: Internal Links
param.description: Enable Snap Shots for internal links

param.name: po
param.label: Web Page Previews Only
param.description: Enable web page previews only. Turns off previews for stock quotes, product info, movie info, video, etc.

param.name: df
param.label: Delay
param.description: Delay loading of Snap Shots until after page loads

param.name: oi
param.label: Opt-in Badge
param.description: Indicates whether Snap Shots should be controlled by the Snap Shots Opt-In Badge.

param.name: shots_trigger
param.label: Trigger
param.description: How to activate a Snap Shot bubble

param.name: lang
param.label: Language
param.description: Indicates the language the Snap Shot will be displayed in. Acceptable values can be found at http://wiki.snap.com/index.php/Translations

param.name: domain
param.label: Domain
param.description: Domain on which the Snap Shots code is being placed.
